name: influx-opcua-logger
description: A logger for logging OPC UA data to InfluxDB
author: Jeroen Coussement (@coussej)

scripts.pkg:win64: pkg --target win-x64 --output ./dist/$npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x64.exe ./src/index.js && cd dist && openssl dgst -sha256 $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x64.exe > $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x64.sha256
scripts.pkg:win32: pkg --target win-x86 --output ./dist/$npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x86.exe ./src/index.js && cd dist && openssl dgst -sha256 $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x86.exe > $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_win-x86.sha256
scripts.pkg:linux: pkg --target linux-x64 --output ./dist/$npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_linux-x64 ./src/index.js && cd dist && openssl dgst -sha256 $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_linux-x64 > $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_linux-x64.sha256
scripts.pkg:macos: pkg --target macos-x64 --output ./dist/$npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_darwin-x64 ./src/index.js && cd dist && openssl dgst -sha256 $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_darwin-x64 > $npm_package_name\_v$npm_package_version\_darwin-x64.sha256
scripts.build: npm run pkg:win64 && npm run pkg:win32 && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos
